story_arceus_05_05000/2401_1001_0100_10: I’m dead tired... Let’s take a break!
story_arceus_05_05000/2401_1001_0200_10: I don’t think I can take any more...
story_arceus_05_05000/2401_1001_0300_10: I’ve still got energy to spare!
story_arceus_05_05000/2401_1001_0400_10: Why don’t we train under a waterfall next?
story_arceus_05_05000/2401_1001_0500_10:
WAHAHAHA! That’s the spirit! Let all that
water crash over your head!
story_arceus_05_05000/2401_1001_0600_10:
You two can do that, with your monster
stamina! I can’t...
story_arceus_05_05000/2401_1001_0700_10: Oh! Sorry! Let me answer this.
story_arceus_05_05000/2401_1001_0800_10: Hello? This is Lyra! Where are you now?
story_arceus_05_05000/2401_1001_0900_10:
I just met up with Clair, and she says if you
come now, she has time!
story_arceus_05_05000/2401_1001_1000_10: Got it! I’ll fly right over!
story_arceus_05_05000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Sorry, something came up! Could we do the
waterfall thing another time?
story_arceus_05_05000/2401_1001_1200_10: Thanks for training with me, you three!
story_arceus_05_05000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Ethan’s always on the phone with someone
or flying off to meet up with folks.
story_arceus_05_05000/2401_1001_1500_10: He gets along with everyone instantly.
story_arceus_05_05000/2401_1001_1600_10:
I know he wants to win...but is training
under a waterfall really necessary?
story_arceus_05_05000/2401_1001_1700_10:
If it can help someone bond with their
Pokémon, I guess it’s worth a shot!
